# Run different scenarios
```{run scenarios}
# Full run model

dat <- list()

for (ii in 1:sims) {
  print(ii)
  for (jj in 1:length(rcpOptions)) {
    print(jj)
    for (kk in 1:length(gcmOptions)) {
      print(kk)
    
      # Big list storing all the results
      dat[[ii]][[rcpOptions[jj]]][[gcmOptions[kk]]] <- den_model(project = pg, 
        params = paramset[ii], 
        data = climateData[[c(jj,kk)]], 
        initial_conditions, dengue_entry, model = modelSpecs)
                        
    }
  }
}
```

```{run scenarios}
# Full run model

dat <- list()

for (ii in 1:sims) {
  print(ii)
  for (jj in 1:length(gcmOptions)) {
    print(jj)
    for (kk in 1:length(rcpOptions)) {
      print(kk)
      out <- list()
      climateData2 <- subset(climateData, source == gcmOptions[jj] & scenario == rcpOptions[kk])
      if (length(climateData2$tdate)==0) next
      parameters <- param_sets[ii,]
      parameters$influx <- 0
    
      # Big list storing all the results
      out <- den_model(project = pg, 
        params = parameters, 
        data = climateData2, 
        initial_conditions, 
        option = pg$model[2])
      out$tdate <- climateData2$tdate
      out$source <- gcmOptions[jj]
      out$scenario <- rcpOptions[kk]
      
      dat <- bind_rows(dat, out)
                        
    }
  }
}

dat$source_scenario <- ifelse(dat$source == "Observed", paste(dat$source), paste(dat$source, dat$scenario, sep = " "))

```

```{r Produce plots, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(dat) +
        geom_line(aes(x=time,y=Nh, group=source_scenario, color=source_scenario))

ggplot(dat) +

ggplot(dat) +
        geom_line(aes(x=time,y=i_h1, group=source_scenario, color=source_scenario))

ggplot(dat) +

ggplot(dat) +
```
